column5: Going there in June,need some pointers. Staying at Maple Leaf Cabins In Laniel. Thanks
I am going there in May, were you ever there ( I wasn't) if you were how was it?? Thanks
I was there last year the last week of june and most the walleye we caught were in current on leaches,crawlers didn't work so good, and you can't use live minnows. hope this helps.
Try a Houseboat on lake kipawa , I was there last year and what a blast! Kipawa Outpost Houseboat rentals. Sometimes can be cheaper than a cabin, with twice the fun.
Check out my website...:www.kippyskorner.com...and T-Bone's website...:http://www.thecanadatrip.com/the_canada_trip_001.htmDig around and you'll find some useful stuff.Mike

Hi Mike,We are going to Taggart Bay Lodge the last week in May, Cabin #2. Have you heard any news on the water level of Lac Kipawa. Just wondering because of the severe drought conditions we have in NJ. Tell your parents Mari Lou and Greg said Hi.
Hey Greg -Will do. "PC" at kipawa.com said lake is 4-5 ft. down yet but rising fast.Take care!Mike
